txt_en: Still like dust, I'll rise despite being trodden.
txt_cn: 虽被践踏如尘，我仍向上而生。

txt_en: Growth comes when we dare to break our shells.
txt_cn: 敢于破壳而出，便是成长的开端。

txt_en: Light shines brighter with shadows around.
txt_cn: 阴影存处，光明愈盛。

txt_en: Anxious hearts find calm in choosing hope.
txt_cn: 焦虑难安之际，择希望而寻从容。

txt_en: Kindness sows seeds that bloom in unexpected ways.
txt_cn: 善意播撒的种子，终将以意外之姿绽放。

txt_en: There's no shame in meeting a worthy opponent.
txt_cn: 遇上旗鼓相当的对手，是幸事而非憾事。

txt_en: Be brave today, the dark night will pass.
txt_cn: 今日勇敢面对，黑夜终会过去。

txt_en: Nothing ever fatigues me but doing what I do not like.
txt_cn: 世间之事，唯有做不喜欢的事，才会让我身心俱疲。

txt_en: Dream big and dare to fail.
txt_cn: 心怀远志，不惧失败。

txt_en: It is far more impressive when others discover your good qualities without your help.
txt_cn: 不靠自己宣扬，让别人发现你的长处，才更令人敬佩。

txt_en: Never give up, even when it seems impossible.
txt_cn: 别轻易放弃，哪怕局面看起来已是穷途末路。

txt_en: Doing the best he can makes a hero.
txt_cn: 拼尽全力者，便是真英雄。

txt_en: Joy finds those who seek it.
txt_cn: 寻乐者，自得其乐。

txt_en: Love the life you live, live the life you love.
txt_cn: 热爱自己的生活，过自己热爱的人生。

txt_en: Your light is enough to guide yourself.
txt_cn: 你的光芒，足以指引前路。

txt_en: Kindness is the purest form of love.
txt_cn: 善良，是爱最纯粹的模样。

txt_en: There's a lot of evil in the world, but if we stick together, it will go away.
txt_cn: 这世间满是恶意，但只要我们同心相伴，恶意自会消散。

txt_en: A friend gives you freedom to be yourself.
txt_cn: 挚友面前，可做真我。

txt_en: This world goes much deeper than you imagine.
txt_cn: 这里的奥秘远超你的想象。

txt_en: Grow through what you go through.
txt_cn: 经一事，长一智。

txt_en: Beyond winter solstice lies the promise of spring's return.
txt_cn: 越过冬至，便见春归

txt_en: Happiness is real only when it is shared with someone you cherish.
txt_cn: 幸福唯有与珍视之人分享，才是最真切的。

txt_en: You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
txt_cn: 人生方向，尽在你掌控。

txt_en: Be soft, be fluent, and discover life's gentle gifts.
txt_cn: 以温柔之心，顺自然之态，发现生活的美好。

txt_en: Carolers sing joy into the winter night.
txt_cn: 颂歌为寒夜注入欢愉。

txt_en: Walk slowly, and you'll see what matters.
txt_cn: 慢下来，你才会明白什么是最珍贵的。

txt_en: Far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
txt_cn: 前路有更美好的风景，胜于过往一切。

txt_en: I will live without shame, loving you with all my heart.
txt_cn: 毫无遗憾地生活，用尽全力去爱你。

txt_en: The strongest warriors are time and patience.
txt_cn: 最强大的战士，是时间与耐心。

txt_en: Some souls stay in yours forever once they enter.
txt_cn: 有些人一旦相遇，便成永恒。

txt_en: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
txt_cn: 伟大始于起步，而非等待完美。
